text: I'm Hiring, looking for a Toronto based product-focused Content Marketing Manager to join the Wild Apricot Content team at Personify. If you or anyone you know fits the bill and is looking, please DM me! <https://personify.bamboohr.com/jobs/view.php?id=140>

attachments.title: Content Marketing Manager
attachments.text: Personify Overview   Personify is the leading solution provider that empowers the best constituent-focused organizations to succeed. Through our constituent engagement software and services, we help our clients better interact with their constituents at every touchpoint. After 20+ years of innovation

elements.text: I'm Hiring, looking for a Toronto based product-focused Content Marketing Manager to join the Wild Apricot Content team at Personify. If you or anyone you know fits the bill and is looking, please DM me!

text:
Here's a bit more detail about the role:

As the product content marketing manager, you are responsible for the strategy and execution of communications on product features and major updates. These are key initiatives that help us educate both existing and potential customers, improve their experience of using Wild Apricot, inspire word of mouth, and build an enthusiastic community of users. Essentially, your job is to help our customers fall in love with our product and get the most out of it.
You’ll be creating communications plans from scratch, so you’ll need to be proactive about identifying opportunities to promote the product and increase retention. You’ll also need to be a great project manager, as you’ll be collaborating with team members from across the marketing, product development, support and onboarding departments to bring campaigns to fruition.
In addition to running marketing campaigns, this role includes developing and managing product-related content on the website and developing content that helps trial users get up to speed on the product. You’ll also put together our monthly newsletter, so you’ll be making decisions on the key stories to share, collaborating with team members and customers, and creating the right messaging to communicate announcements.
Every day will be different: you might be launching a new feature, announcing a company update, or finding new ways to share information with customers. You will be publishing blog
posts, writing copy for web pages, creating email campaigns and nurture tracks, running webinars and planning in-product messaging.
For this role, you’ll need to be passionate about trying out new features, understanding the product and our users inside and out, and increasing product usage and feature adoption. If you’re ready to help customers feel informed, empowered and inspired to use Wild Apricot, we’d love to hear from you!
